Good Comments: good subs

Bad Comments: Colored outlines, Good Font size, perfect timing.
Great subs, but with some rather strange translations and grammatical errors here and there. Nothing major though.

Good Comments: Garbage unreadable background-blending hairmatch colored outlines. Sure, it's softsubbed, but I don't want to change 4-7 styles in EVERY episode.
Well, they're the only sub available with the latest episodes. O_o
Liked the WS subs for the first two episodes, but OK with the SD subs for the remaining eleven episodes. Hope they decide to continue with the WS subs.
Excellent subs, but with a few English grammar related problems here and there.
Bad Comments: They're the only ones subbing so you don't have a choice, but their timer sucks and has a habit of jumping over conversations to give priority to background chatter that has no impact on the story.
I love the styled soft subs, the accurate translations and the amazing video quality. As expected from Spoonsubs.
Clear subs, no grammatical errors, and high quality.

Styled Subs are annoying, but all typesetting is hard-subbed, so feel free to at least remove the colour customisation.  Doesn't play properly for me on MPC+CCCP, have to use Mplayer to get it to work properly.
